main event: A radar detection identified a possible meteor or unidentified object crossing the sky over Djakarta, Indonesia.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5-10 seconds while a piece fell off the main body of the object., The object was visible at a 45°-50° elevation at night., The object got dimmer as it crossed the sky., The speed and trajectory were too fast for an aircraft but too slow for a typical meteor., The witness was a son of a local FAA representative and had seven friends with him who also confirmed the sighting.
witness description: witness is a student studying engineering and is a member of Air Force ROTC accompanied by seven friends aged 16-21
